title: S2 Ep11: Pensions and poverty in Paraguay
itunes:title: Pensions and poverty in Paraguay
description: Paraguay, like Peru and Mexico, is supporting seniors with a monthly non-contributory pension payment. What difference does this income make to the people who receive it? Quite a lot, Sebastian Galiani tells Tim Phillips.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
